channel.title: First thoughts - Black Mesa Early Access
channel.description:
First of i cannot say how amazed i am about how much the game was changed. I am writing this before i even got to the Resonance Cascade scene, and i feel like one of the guys from this video: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fRscYVvEFt8']80's Aerobic[/url] :smiley: In common words, i feel exited as hell.With all those tiny details that are greater than in the free mod version.In my opinion 19,99€ is well worth the money for the game.And take note of course that this game is built by die-hard fans who know the Valve titles and their ways for years. :thumbup:
So at that point it really pisses me of when certain BM forum or other people complain about the game. :cursing:
And on another note, and relevant to the ARG thread i found this white board in the lab segment before the hazard suit room with lockers. One thing that stood out is the red writings.In the end it says: EXT 384 BIOME ![2015-05-11_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://ehtENjfHjpZLUEV11CxSSYpxERn.jpeg)

item.title: First thoughts - Black Mesa Early Access
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
Well i tried multiplayer.
I had a bit of a problem.
The game runs fine in a closed small areas.
But glitches like crazy in open areas or areas
filled with animations.

I tried lowering everything, but didn’t help.
Eventually it crashed.
